Compiled from "SecurityCache.java"
public interface org.jboss.security.cache.SecurityCache<T> {
  public abstract void addCacheEntry(T, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>) throws org.jboss.security.cache.SecurityCacheException;

  public abstract boolean cacheHit(T);

  public abstract void cacheOperation(T, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>) throws org.jboss.security.cache.SecurityCacheException;

  public abstract <Y> Y get(T) throws org.jboss.security.cache.SecurityCacheException;
}
